texts.name: Elijah
texts.text: Grandma wanted to say something to Allie one last time.

texts.name: Elijah
texts.text: I wanted to say something too, since it's the last time I'll see her.
texts.thought: Or it was, last time was wierd...

choices.text: What did she want to say to Allie?
choices.wrongAnswer: I dunno, I don't think she likes her that much.

choices.text: What happened last time Allie babysat you?
choices.wrongAnswer: She helped me draw a dinosaur! Grandma let me hang it!

choices.text: What was Allie doing last time?
